email_content:
Dear Mr. Thompson,

I hope this message finds you well.

I am writing to provide a summary of our department's compliance progress. Recently, we reviewed the latest international student policies to ensure that our department is fully aligned with the standards. Furthermore, all faculty members have been updated on these changes to maintain consistent adherence to the guidelines.

Should you require any additional details or have specific questions, please feel free to reach out.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
